column7: wɔ hɔn mbapɔmba no nyinara hɔ dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee
column8: mpoma duebien: kyerɛw nyimpa biara ne dzin wɔ no poma do."

column2: "Na kyerɛw Aaron ne dzin wɔ Levi poma do: na poma kor nyɛ hɔn egyanom efi do tsitsir kor dze."
"Na gyaa mu gu ehyiadzibuw no mu wɔ Dase no enyim
"Na ɔbɛba dɛ banyin a mibeyi no no
column3: no poma bɛfefɛw: na mebɛma mo ho ehwinhwin a Israelmba hwinhwin tsia hom no egyaa."
na hɔn mbapɔmba no nyinara memaa no mpoma
column5: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee no
column6: mekyerɛ mpoma duebien: na Aaron no poma wɔ hɔn mpoma no mu."

column2: "Na Moses gyaa mpoma no mu guu EWURADZE enyim wɔ Dasebuw no mu."

column3: Moses kɔr Dasebuw no mu no; na
column5: Aaron no poma no a ɔyɛ Levi ofi dze no afefɛw

column2: "Na Moses dze mpoma no nyinara fi EWURADZE enyim brɛɛ Israelmba no nyinara: na wɔhwɛe
column3: na nyimpa biara faa no poma."
Fa Aaron no poma no san to Dase no enyim
column4: ma wɔmfa nsie nyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze mma mba asoɔdzenfo no; ama eetwa hɔn ehwinhwin a wohwinhwin tsia me no do

column2: "Dɛm na Moses yɛe: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ no no
"Na Israelmba no kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ

column3: nyia ɔba EWURADZE ntamadan no ho
